subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] This might chap some hides. [4 Attachments]
author: April Abercrombie
full_text:
------=_NextPart_000_00AB_01C9C260.16DC6000
Content-Type: text/plain;
	charset="iso-8859-1"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

What is interesting to me with these recordings is that they appear to all =
be in the same voice.

  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: Frank Sumpti=
on 
  To: evp-itc@yahoogroups.com ; grassharp@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Tues=
day, April 21, 2009 8:56 AM
  Subject: [EVP-ITC] This might chap some hides=
. [4 Attachments]


  [Attachment(s) from Frank Sumption included below] 

=


   This is from the old RS digital that I did last night. Mostly they see=
med to be talk about Chris Moon, and the box with the lever switches, which=
 is #46. For those that may have heard otherwise, experimenting with tones =
was my idea, there was no "specifications" for the box from any other sourc=
e, same as with all other boxes.  I know many have a problem with Moon, and=
 I can understand that, but there seems to be a level, or group of spirits =
that do work with him. I do not agree with the Edison thing, but... what do=
  ya do? 

   I had been playing with tones since box #5, and just this yea=
r tried to incorporate that into the design again as some of the voices wer=
e asking for eight signals. 46 and 47 have the eight tones, although I'm no=
t sure what frequency they are supposed to be, but eight suggests musical s=
cales. So far it seems to do little to enhance the voices. 46 and 47 are mo=
re like breadboarded systems, they are not in cabinets, just mounted on a p=
lywood base with a make shift front panel. I put four tone generators in 51=
, just cuz I had some extra board space. 

   Of course "they" want 46, it'=
s the best box of this year, and I've been relucatant to give it up. Even i=
n spirit communcations, you can tell which are the human spirits. Just cuz =
they are dead doesn't mean they have any higher modivations. I remain reluc=
tant to give this stuff so someone else can claim it's an Edison invnetion,=
 or to claim demons and shadow people come through box, or it opens portals=
, and on and on. I'm pretty discouraged with all things paranormal. I'm not=
 jumping up and rushing out just cuz some voice said something, been there =
done that, and it's always disappointing. 

   Frank-S

  
------=_NextPart_000_00AB_01C9C260.16DC6000
